root: ^You are late for your shift! We have a problem on the floor; the line is pushing out low quality product... please help us fix this disaster!
^Oh, you don't work here? Well you do now!
^What we in the field call a 'while loop' is what we have been using to run the factory for years, but someone forgot to set a production condition, and it won't stop!
^Quick, hit the emergency stop button in the corner.
